channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Soaring Energy Demand Mints China’s Newest Billionaire
item.description: Shares of Zhang Jianhui’s energy storage maker Beijing HyperStrong Technology are up almost 500% so far this year.

item.title: StarTech Launches Driverless Dock With Support For Three Displays And USB4 Speeds
item.description: This USB4 dock supports for up to three external displays running at 4K resolution and a refresh rate of 60Hz. It also has plenty of USB ports, althou...

item.title: Term Sheet Next: Erica Wenger on elephants, branding in VC, and her first fund
item.description: In our latest Term Sheet Next, Erica Wenger’s Park Rangers Capital has raised its debut $4.3 million fund.

item.title: Ex-Meta exec says Mark Zuckerberg taught him a lesson in work-life balance: Now he has strict rules for meetings and emails at his $1 billion tax firm
item.description: After years at Meta, Martin Ott learned from Mark Zuckerberg that working smarter beats working longer: “It is making sure that you’re not about 24/7 ...

item.title: Your electric bill has replaced the price at the pump as the hot-button, political bellwether
item.description: Residential electricity prices have skyrocketed almost 30% in four years with the AI boom expected to further pressure costs.

item.title: In the age of AI, CEOs quietly signal that layoffs are a badge of honor
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Butchered jobs and inflation data add fuel to the fire of uncertainty already blazing in the markets

item.title: Asking Your Therapist To Confer With The AI Chatbot That’s Giving You Off-The-Cuff Mental Health Advice
item.description: People ask ChatGPT and AI chatbots for mental health advice. Latest twist is then asking a therapist to review what the AI has been advising. An AI In...

item.title: ‘Macross Plus: Movie Edition’ Gets Screening In New York This November
item.description: The genuinely excellent 'Macross Plus: Movie Edition' is getting a theatrical screening in New York later this month, with an introduction by Shinichi...

item.title: iOS 26.1 Or iOS 18.7.2—Here’s Which New iPhone Update To Choose
item.description: You can still choose whether to upgrade your iPhone to iOS 18.7.2 or iOS 26.1. So, which iPhone update should you select?

item.title: Meet the U.S. official who is most serious about fighting inflation
Is the longest strike in America about to end?
1K unionized Starbucks baristas launch labor strike at 65 stores
item.description: Starbucks strike hits Red Cup Day as over 1,000 baristas walk out at 65 stores nationwide. Union workers are protesting stalled contract talks.

item.title: Shutdown delays October inflation report – what does the Fed's data say?
item.description: The government shutdown delayed the October CPI inflation report indefinitely, as alternate gauges like the Cleveland Fed's inflation nowcast estimate...

item.title: Inside Wall Street’s path to ‘always on’ overnight U.S. trading, spurred by Asia
Bitcoin sinks to 6-month low, as long-term holders step up selling
Bitcoin sinks to 6-month low, deepning rout as long-term holders step up selling
New York and New Jersey lose hundreds of billions in resident income as Americans flee to low-tax states
item.description: New York and New Jersey lost nearly $700 billion in resident income from 2013-2022 as millions fled to low-tax states like Florida and Texas in histor...

item.title: How one company is transforming rural communities with tech careers
item.description: IT services company Provalus is revitalizing rural communities by bringing hundreds of technology jobs and spurring local business development.

item.title: Activist investor pushes Cracker Barrel shareholders to oust DEI specialist
item.description: Cracker Barrel faces proxy fight as activist investor claims company's rebranding "fiasco" destroyed $1.2 billion in shareholder value amid leadership...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
